As you're waiting for the waitress, you hear vibrations, loud ones and then gulp. "Oh no." You say. There was only one waitress who was that heavy. Elektra the loxodon and as you turn around, you see that elephantine giantess smiling down at you fiendishly. "Hello, Stephen." She says as she licks her lips, prompting you to step back nervously.

Elektra may be a loxodon and therefore a humanoid Asian elephant, but she loved to devour humans and made it perfectly clear that she wanted to swallow you down. In fact, the first time you met her, she sucked you up her trunk and would've dropped you in her mouth if Azure hadn't stopped her. This was not good.

"Elektra," you say. "Come on, not this again, not so soon. Elektra, you're an elephant. Why eat me? You're supposed to be an herbivore." Elektra picks up a saltshaker with her trunk and starts to salt you. "I'm not an elephant, Stephen. I'm a monster that looks like an elephant. I can't help it if you humans are nature's most perfect food." Elektra then clicks her pen. "But I just finished breakfast myself and I might decide not to eat you, today that is. And if I do decide, you're entitled to a last meal, that way, you're good and stuffed." Elektra hold her pen with her trunk to her notepad as she continues to look at you.

You didn't know who was scarier, Paisley or Elektra. Arguably Elektra. At least Paisley couldn't leave the water. Elektra tapped her stomach with her free hand and you could see drool run down from the loxodon's lip to her chin. "So, what will it be today, Stevie?"

You definitely didn't trust Elektra, but you did want breakfast. What to have?
145.title: Rouge Elephant Elektra

1451.content:
You decide to give in to your hunger over your fear and brush some of the salt Elektra had shaken onto you. Setting your shoulder's you take a deep breath and manage to keep your voice firm as you shout up to your waitress, "I'll have the vegetarian omelet, extra cheese on top please." The loxodon scoffed at your decision to forgo any kind of meat and scribbled your order on her notepad. "Your order will be right out" she said, giving your small form another hungry glance and licking her lips once more before walking off to put in your order.

As you felt her footsteps fade away you let out a sigh of relief and sat down, deciding to just keep to yourself and relax instead of socializing with the other guests as your breakfast was made. You were quite literally shaken out of your relaxation as Elektra returned, carrying a plate that had your omelet on it. As she deposited it on the table in front of you you couldn't help but lick your lips. The breakfast confection had obviously just been made, it was so hot that the cheese was still melting on it. "Wow thanks Elektra that really was fast" you said, looking up to the giant anthro. She expression was worrying, she was drooling a bit more then she usually did while looking at you. "Oh don't thank me just yet Stephen" she said as she-
1451.title: An Omelet

15.content:
Chapter 2E- The Lobby

You decide to hang out in the lobby by the fireplace. At least then you’d have some warmth. To your luck, before you even have to go on duty, Felicia had already put wood in the fire. You sigh in relief and decide to get warm. You look around and see that this was the area the ski guests hang out in when they visited. There were in fact five regular customers that usually showed up on the weekends to cut loose.

First of them was Hippolyta the hippogriff. She was a likable monster, if a little obsessed. She was a treasure hunter and swore that there was something she was after in the mountains. According to Hippolyta herself, a wererhino pirate called Captain Blackhorn hid a treasure worth millions somewhere in the mountain area centuries ago and Hippolyta wanted to find it. Fortunately for you she wasn’t particularly greedy and offered you some of the treasure if you wanted to come along. But you kept turning her down. Sometimes you wonder if that pirate’s treasure really exists.

Of course another of the regular customers was Connie’s friend, Sora the wyvern. Sora was a photographer who took pictures and cut them up for art projects. According to Connie, Sora’s gone on dates with as many men as there are species of monsters. Sora tended to flirt with you but she also saw humans as tiny seat cushions. She didn’t sit on you hard enough to squish you, but she did have some sort of weird fetish when it came to humans. You’ve seen her shiny pewter ass up close one time too many.

Then there was a friend of yours who was also an enemy at the same time. A landshark by the name of Zoe. The hammerhead giantess saw humans as nothing more than food. But fortunately for you, Zoe lost her eyesight years ago and couldn’t tell one species of monster from another. She assumed you were a shape shifting fairy and you decided to humor her. It disgusted you to be lumped in the same group with Stella but better safe than swallowed. Fortunately the shark woman could be very sociable to people she doesn’t think of as food. You wonder how Zoe could snowboard like a pro if she couldn’t see a thing.

One of the more obnoxious guests was that condescending pegasus Blair. She saw herself as the best skater and the most beautiful monster in the world despite being as fat as Roxy. Blair saw you as an unintelligent slave and spoke to you as if she was talking to a little kid. She doesn’t understand you work as an employee at the lodge and believes you’re Azure, Roxy and Elisa’s slave. Because of this, she thinks it’s no big deal for her to order you around and expects you to do whatever she says. If you have to give her one more hoof massage, you are going to scream.

The most terrifying guest was Comet, a minotaur skier. Comet was also your friend Mesa’s niece. While it’s ambiguous whether or not Mesa would cook and eat you, Comet was blatantly dangerous to humans. She would squish or eat you on sight. But it wasn’t always like that. She had a human boyfriend that she used to love more than anyone else. But one day Comet caught her boyfriend cheating on her with a salamander. She was so heartbroken at the betrayal, she thinks humans should go extinct and is out to see that happens. She especially hates you because you’re a doppelganger of her ex.

Suddenly you see a shadow cast over you. One of the regulars was in the room and you turn around to see which one it is.
15.title: The Lobby

choices: no photo gear, you've been tricked!
Photo Equipment for the magazine shoot (Normal)
Photo Equipment for the magazine shoot (Fetish)
151.content: "oh, hey Sora" you say "what are you up to". "Just taking some photos" she replies "I'm actually glad I found you, I was wondering if you wouldn't mind me doing a photo shoot of you". what kind of photo shoot could she possibly need a human for? you ask yourself. "what kind of photo shoot is this" you ask. "just something for a magazine nothing too crazy" she replies. "I don't know" you say. "please I really need your help". "alright I'll do it" you say "Hopefully I wont regret it" but your voice is drowned out by the massive wyverns squeal of joy "thank you, thank you, thank you" she cries "and trust me you wont regret this". Sora picks you up off the floor and proceeds to bring you to a room she rented within the lodge. "welcome to my studio" you look around and notice the lights are off and there is barely enough light to navigate the room. Sora brings you into the center of the room and places you onto a table. "let me get the lights" she says "since I can see in the dark I don't like to use them unless I have to". you here the sounds of her moving around the room before your blinded by the sudden light. once your eyes clear you look around and see
151.title: Sora

1513.content: along the wall you see examples of the fetish magazine Sora will be shooting you for. what are they?
1513.title: Photo Equipment for the magazine shoot (Fetish)

15131.content:
You then looked at the photos on the wall and then you notice what she was going to be taking pictures for you on what will it are about. It is vore, and you know what vore is, it’s you getting eaten by a monster. You knew this could be your final day should this be able to succeed. Getting eaten is not fun, and plus you had so many close encounters, that it is almost impossible to decide where to start. You remember all the traumatic times that you got nearly ate by Paisley, that one son of a bitch you call a mermaid tried to kill you, and you remember all the bad memories you had with her. No wonder why you are saved so many times by Roxy, and even Chihiro herself. “Uh… Sora, I am not too sure about this. Don’t you think this is going really really far?” you asked her.

“Of course not silly, we are only going to be taking pictures of the moments that lead up to you getting devoured. You won’t be actually devoured at all, and plus the reason I am doing this is that I want to show people how good humans are. Now true they are humans that I do like to keep as friends like you for one, but they are some really bad humans that deserve to get eaten. (Wade for example in Monster Gaol, but she doesn’t know that at all), and I have invited a special partner that is going to be helping you on this job, I bet you will be really pleased to see her.” Sora told her just as she reveals the mystery guest that was being lowered into the area (who was in somehow a very big container that no one saw that was real until now. It was filled with water). It was none other than Paisley (I am not explaining her looks again, so don’t ask me, you know how she looks like by now). You were screaming in terror just as Paisley was swimming in the tank that Sora brought in a little while ago somehow, and Paisley sees you screaming and so she growls and etc. “ARE YOU FREAKING CRAZY?!!!!!!” you shouted in terror as Sora (the wyvern dragon) comes over to calm you down. “Calm down Stephen, call down, I promise you that this will be over quick, and plus, she won’t eat you.” She said just as she flapped her wings and gets her camera ready. Paisley then rises from the container and then comes over to the deck where you are waiting for.

“Paisley, you better not eat me this time.” You shouted to her, but Paisley smiled and snickered a bit. “Ah relax dude, she paid me 200 dollars to not eat you actually during the photo shoot. I am just going to get moments that leads up to the eating of you, and I promise that this won’t take long at all, but any other time, I will come for you dude.” She threatened to you, and then you just want to escape the photo shoot, as you never know if she will actually eat you for sure. You hope it isn’t the case, but it could be. Sora seems to always have something interesting with you, but you are kinda scared of her as she tends to use you as a relaxing pillow or something. You just want to be done with this mess, as it’s not good at all.

"So... are you in Stephen?" Sora asked you, hoping that you would do this for Gulp Magazine. "Oh what's wrong, is Stephen is too chicken to do it?" Paisley mocked and mocked you like a chicken.

What is your reaction?
15131.title: ARE YOU CRAZY?!!!!!!!!!!!!!

152.content:
The shadow belongs to Hippolyta. She's looking down on you with a gleam in her eye. You know that gleam all too well. "Hey Stephen. Finally ready to help me search for Captain Blackhorn's treasure?" You've gone through this with her so many times before. For one, if you go too far into the mountains and get separated from her, you would be out of luck. Also, you were starting to doubt that this treasure even existed.

"Look Hippolyta..." you start with a sigh. She interrupts you before you can go any further though. "I know what you're going say. Before you turn me down just hear me out." You look at her sceptically as she continues. "I think I've found a good trail. I can make some progress, but I just need a buddy to give me a hand."

You maintain your sceptical look, but she keeps pressing you. "Come on, I'll give you a fair share of the treasure. I really think I'm on to something this time, just trust me." She does sound really sure of herself this time, and you've never helped her before. Maybe you should be nice and go with her this time.

What do you do?
152.title: Hippolyta

1521.content:
"Okay." you say. "I'll help." Hippolyta smiles and picks you up. "You made the right choice my friend. We're gonna find something out there, I can feel it." she says as she places you on her shoulder. "Now let's get ready." She takes you to get the right clothes for the hunt. Once your bundled up for the cold, she places you in her cleavage. "Don't want to get separated." she tells you as she firmly wedges you between the feathery breasts. After you're secured she heads out.

As Hippolyta trudges through the snow you look at your surroundings. Sure the scenery is pleasent to look at, but you honestly don't expect to find any treasure. At least she was used to coming back emptyhanded, so she probably wouldn't be too disappointed. You relax and enjoy the warmth of her breasts added to your snow gear.What happens next?
1521.title: Sure, why not?

15211.content:
As time passes you find that the two of you are pretty deep in the mountains and its started snowing really bad. You still haven't found anything but you kind of expected that. Eventually though, your colossal partner comes to a stop. You poke your head out to see that Hippolyta is standing in front of a cave. "Well, this is it!" she says. "I just know that something's in here!" You look up to her beaked face. "Why are you so sure?" you ask. She gives you a knowing look and responds. "This is farther into the mountains I've ever been. The one cave in the middle nowhere surrounded by this kind of weather? There's got to be something here!"

Of course you question her logic but hey, she's the boss right now. She makes her way into the cave and you must admit its pretty cool in here, in both temperature and ambiance. The walls are a sparkly blue and there are icicles hanging from the ceiling. There are also random patches of ice all over that tie it all together. Hippolyta wanders through the maze-like cave and eventually reaches a dead end. "Well, at least we did our best..." you begin to say, but she cuts you off.

"This is it!" she yells. You don't understand Sensing your confusion she explains. "There's air coming through this crack in the wall. There's something behind here!" She's getting really excited. Unfortunately, no matter how hard she tries, the wall was too tough for any of her tools to break. "Well," she says. "Since we can't break the wall you'll have to head to the other side." She takes you out of her cleavage and lowers you to the crack. You honestly can't help getting a little excited too.

You make your way through the crack and come out on the other side. "What do you see?" she calls out. "Nothing!" you respond. "Just a bunch of rocks frozen in ice!" You make your way to the wall of ice and absentmindedly kick a piece thats sticking out. It breaks, causing various cracks to appear one after another. Sensing whats coming, you dive out of the way as the ice shatters and the rocks topple forward. The largest one smashes into the wall, cracking it open. Hippolyta strolls forward and plucks you off the ground. "See? I knew you'd be a great treasure hunter!" she says. The two of you make your way to the end of the cave, but what do you find?
15211.title: Into the Cave

choices: "... I have to turn you into statues."
"...I have to crush you both under my fat."
152111.content:
In front of both of you was the treasure. Piles upon Piles of gold, silver, platinum, and gems filled the cave. But that's not what caught both yours and Hippolyta's attention. In the center of all the treasure was a giant, beautiful statue made of garnet crystal. It appeared to be a dragoness statue. It was twice Hippolyta's height. The statue had short, spikey hair made of amythests. It's eyes were solid emeralds. It's body was enormously fat. If she were human sized, she'd probably weigh 3 tons. The statue's huge breasts were resting on it's gargantuan belly, and it was sitting on it's enormous butt. The statue had a long tail and wings.

"I can't believe it!" Hippolyta said happily. "We actually found the treasure! I told you it was real!"

"You were actually right for once." You said, surprised. "I'm amazed. How on Earth did Captain Blackhorn move a statue this big?"

"Who cares. We're going to be rich and famous." Hippolyta yelled. There was a tear in her eye. "It's all so beautiful."

"Thank you very much." The statue replied.

Both of you jumped. The statue was talking? "You talk?" You asked.

"Yes I can." The statue said. "My name is Lora. I used to be a member of Captain Blackhorn's crew. She must not have trusted me. While we were hiding this treasure, she hit me in the back with a curse. Believe it or not, I wasn't always a statue. That curse did this to me. She said that I would be this treasures guardian for all of time. I can leave anytime, but then she hit me with another curse. It made me so fat that I can't move. I've been stuck here for years."

"Geeze. That sucks." You say.

"I know. I know you want this treasure, but the curse means I have to guard it no matter what. So now..."
152111.title: Statuesque Guardian

choices: Continue Through Hippolyta's POV Fighting Lora
Continue Through Stephen's POV in Lora's Belly
1521111.content:
"I have to eat you both." Lora said with tears in her eyes. Lora then let out a roar and breathed out a stream of fire, forcing Hippolyta to move to the side as you hang onto her tight and scream. Lora roars again and tries to chomp Hippolyta, all while shedding tears that turned into pearls on the ground. "This is just great!" yells Hippolyta. "We finally find Blackhorn's treasure and a giant dragon made of treasure tries to eat us!" "Figures there'd be a booby trap." She said.

Lora then swung her tail and hit Hippolyta in the leg as Hippolyta yelled out. The wound even started to bleed from the crystal spikes. Lora opens her mouth wide enough that her mouth is somehow as big as Hippolyta and shows a large tongue made out of rubies with sapphires for teeth and an esophagus lined with peridot. She tries to swallow Hippolyta whole but Hippolyta quickly grabs a gold scepter to hold Lora's mouth open as Lora continues to roar. "We better get out of here!" you yell. Hippolyta runs on the ground and groans as the wound on her leg acts up and even hears her knee cracking. "Hippolyta!" you yell in worry. "Don't panic," says Hippolyta. "I'll be fine. And the entryway is...."

Before Hippolyta can even finish her sentence, Lora jumps in and her massive bejeweled belly shakes as she blocks the exit. Hippolyta bounces off of Lora's big belly and you nearly fall off Hippolyta's back as Lora spits the scepter out and continues to cry pearl tears. "Please," she says. "Please don't make this any harder than it needs to be. It's not my will to harm you." But Lora breathes down fire and Hippolyta has to pick up a golden shield to block the flames before flying into the air as you're holding on.

"Hippolyta!" you yell. "She has wings too." "Don't worry," scoffs your hippogriff friend. "Her obesity combined with the fact that she's made out of gems would make it impossible for her to..." But Hippolyta is quickly proven wrong as Lora opens her wings and flies up with a roar as the opal wings glow. She quickly catches up and breathes more fire forcing Hippolyta to fly in a zigzag as you yell and fall down. "Stephen!" yells Hippolyta.

You land in Lora's most and she quickly slams you shut as the crystal dragon swallows you and you tumble screaming down her peridot throat. "Stephen!" shouts Hippolyta.
1521111.title: Dealing with Dragons

choices: You Try to Figure a Way Out as the Fight Goes On
15211112.content:
While Hippolyta is outside dealing with Lora, you slide down the crystal dragon's peridot-coated throat and scream before you land in a topaz-coated stomach. You look around and see that the stomach juices are made out of liquid amber and gasp. You let out a groan. "You have got to be kidding me!" you yell. "I get chased by predatory mermaids, minotaurs and elephants and a dragon made out of crystal is what eats me!? WTH!" You then start to hyperventilate and gulp. "Don't panic, Stephen," you say. "You've gotten out of worse situations than this in the past."

You then gasp and look around to see that Lora's stomach was filled with skeletons of humans and monsters who apparently tried to plunder Captain Blackhorn's treasure in the past and were eaten by the dragoness. You become more worried and see you are still waist deep in the amber stomach juices and climb upon the skull of a what appears to be a werebat and then shake off the amber liquid. You have no idea if the stuff is corrosive and there was no way for you to tell if these fallen humans and monsters were actually digested or they just starved to death and decayed over a long period of time.

Of all the booby traps and security measures you've seen in treasure hunting and adventurer films, none of them could prepare you for this kind of trap. You can only hear the sounds of Hippolyta and Lora fighting and there isn't even a sound of a heart beat or a digestive system. Then again, nobody could hear any form of bodily functions underneath all these crystals. You see that Lora's body appeared somewhat transparent from the inside but you can barely see what's going on, other than the fact that Hippolyta has picked up a shield in an attempt to fight off the dragon. Suddenly, things get really hot in the stomach and then you gasp. "Oh no! Oh no! Dragon breath!"

You immediately duck as a stream of fire comes up from where Lora's intestines would be and fires up her throat for her to breathe the flames. The insides then shake and you tumble into a pile of human bones as the giant crystal dragon flies through the air. You bite on your nails and sweat. Even if Lora doesn't digest you (You don't know if she even could), you wouldn't survive if this keeps up." You have got to get out of here.
15211112.title: Lora's Stomach

152112.content: What else could be here?
152112.title: Something else

choices: a small, light blue ball and a note
1521121.content:
"This... this can't be right!" Hippolyta screams when she sees a wall. "There should be a passage here. Where is it?"

"I really don't think there's anything here." You say. But Hippolyta isn't listening to you and being frantically groping the wall. As she does, she grabs and pull down a rock that was jutting out. To both your surprises, the wall opens up, revealing another passage.

"Aha! I knew there was more cave!" Hippolyta shouts in excitement before entering the new passage. But when she does, a blade suddenly swings down from the ceiling. Hippolyta sees it and ducks, the blade just barely missing the top of her head.

"Uh, maybe we should turn back." You say, freaked out.

"No way. There's only one reason why a booby trap would be here. And that's because it's guarding treasure. Come on." Hippolyta says before continuing on.

The blade wasn't the only trap in the cave, though. As you continue, you keep triggering more traps. From walls that tried to crush you, to a fake floor that tried to drop you into a pit. There were even arrows being fired out of the wall (you thought that was cliched). Eventually, the two of you reach another dead end. But this one was different. Right in front of the wall was an old pirate chest with a simple padlock.

"We did it! We found the treasure!" Hippolyta shouts in joy. You, however, are underwhelmed.

"All this time and all the traps for one chest? I was expecting something more. Piles of gold, many gems, maybe even a living statue." You say.

"Who cares? We found it! Let's see what's inside." On that, Hippolyta bends down and breaks the lock of the chest with a rock. Beaming with joy, she opens the chest. After all this build-up and excitement, inside the chest is...
1521121.title: Crap! Traps!

15211211.content:
Hippolyta's face fell when she looked inside the chest. All that was in there was a light blue ball and a note.

"This is it? I searched for all this time, followed every clue, and THIS is all there is?" She looked like she was about to cry. "I WASTED ALL THAT TIME FOR A STUPID F*****G BALL?!"

"Hey. Calm down. You proved there was a treasure, so there's that." You say, trying to cheer her up.

Before she can respond, the ball zipped out of the chest and flew out of the cave. Both you and Hippolyta were surprised.

"What the heck was that about?" You ask.

Hippolyta turns back to the chest and picks up the note. Her eyes go wide when she reads it.

"Uh, Stephen? You might want to read this." She says before showing you the note. You begin to read it:

'If you're reading this note, then you've already opened the chest and released the ball. That was Sloth, one of the Seven Deadly Sins. Now that it's out, it's going to look for a host, then bond with their soul. It will turn them into the living embodiment of Sloth. It caused trouble for my crew, so I locked it up and hid it away. But you let it out. Nice going. I wish you luck in getting it back.

Signed,

Captain Blackhorn'

"This isn't good." You say. "We need to get back to the lodge."

"I agree." Hippolyta says before starting for the exit, note still in hand.
-------------------------------------------------------
It took a few hours, but you both make it back. Azure is outside.
"Stephen, where were you?" She asks once she sees you.

"It's a long story." You say.

"No time. We have a bit of a problem." She says before gesturing you and Hippolyta to follow her.

You enter the lobby. Azure stops and points to a nearby couch. You look and see that there is a fat, light-blue figure on it. Looking closer, you see the figure is...
15211211.title: A Ball of Dashed Hopes... Or Not

152112111.content:
The figure was none other than Felicia who was surprisingly snoozing away. But something was different about her. While she was chubby before, for some reason, Felicia was even fatter than she previously was and her fur had turned bright blue. You could finally see the werejaguar's spots that were previously invisible due to her black fur. She was so large that her maid's outfit looked tight on her. You and Hippolyta look on in surprise. "Is that Felicia?" you ask. "What happened?" asks Hippolyta.

Azure gives a look of concern as Felicia continues to snore. "I don't really know," she says in regards to her sleeping daughter. "She was doing her job as a waitress when suddenly she said that she felt tired and then she plunked herself down for a nap. That's not like my daughter at all. I've never known her to slack off on the job." Felicia then lets out a yawn. "Not so loud, Mom," she says. "I'm trying to sleep." Felicia then begins to snore before the couch breaks under her weight. Not that this does anything to wake her up.

Suddenly, Hippolyta gives a squawk. "That ball!" she yells. Azure blinks in confusion. "What ball?" she asks. You twitch your fingers. "Well," you say. "We were hunting for Captain Blackhorn's treasure." "And as usual," says Azure in a snarky tone. "Hippolyta came back empty-winged." "Uh," says Hippolyta. "Not exactly. We found a ball of blue light and opened the jar and then we read a note saying that it was the embodiment of sloth." "Sloth?" asks Azure in confusion. "You mean that lazy South American animal?" "Nope," you say. "The sin. It must've possessed Felicia and made her lazy." Azure gives a gasp. "Oh no."

Roxy is soon called in to tend to Felicia as she was snoring up a storm. Felicia had swelled up so fat that Roxy had to climb onto her stomach to inspect her with a stethoscope. "All vitals are normal," says Roxy. "In fact, they seem to be working better than before. However, it looks like she's going to be asleep for a while. I'd say a week." "A week?" asks Azure in shock. "Are you kidding me? That's my daughter there! You need to wake her up. Roxy, didn't they teach you anything in medical school." Roxy bit her lip. "Nothing to do with evil spirits. I'm in over my head." You can't help but feel guilty. If you and Hippolyta didn't go looking for treasure, Felicia wouldn't be in this state.

Just then, who should come from downstairs to help?
152112111.title: Lazy Cat

1521122.content:
What you find at the end of the cave makes no sense to you. There's a giant wererhino sleeping in the middle of the floor. She's got midnight blue skin and two jet black horns on her head. Another thing that was strange was that she was dressed like a pirate. She was wearing stereotypical pirate clothes complete with a black captain's coat and hat.

"Holy shit!" Hippolyta exclaims. "That's Captain Blackhorn!" She walks over to the sleeping monster and kneels down next to her body. There is so much going on right now you can't even begin to process it. "Hippolyta, wasn't Captain Blackhorn supposed to be around hundreds of years ago?" you point out. "But she looks like all the depictions I've seen!" she argues. She tries to wake up the wererhino, but to no avail.

You hop down for a closer look. "Why won't she wake up?" you ponder as you walk up to her body. Then you notice something else that's strange. She's been sleeping deep in this cave in the middle of a snowy mountain, but her body is still warm to the touch. You then look off to the side and see some sort of amulet lying on the ground. Its cracked and looks ready to break. When you reach out to touch it the thing shatters. As soon as that happens you hear a yawn. You look over to see that Blackhorn is sitting up rubbing her eyes. Now that she's not laying down you see that she's a thick, full bodied woman with some muscle as well. Also, you'd estimate that she's got a good 200 feet on Hippolyta.

Once she's awake enough she spots the two of you. What does she do?
1521122.title: Sleeping Beauty

15211221.content:
What are you doing here?" she asks groggily. You hear a Scottish accent in her voice. "Uuhh, we're here looking for treasure?" Hippolyta says, unsure of how to respond. Why are you answering questions? You should be the ones asking them!

As if a buzzer went off in her head, Blackhorn suddenly jumps to her feet. "Oh! I remember!" she exclaims. "I was in here looking for a good place to hide treasure!" You still don't know what to make of this. "Why were you sleeping on the floor?" you ask. "Well I had a magic amulet that was meant to preserve any treasure that might not hold up. While I was in here there was a cave in and it surprised me. I must have activated the amulet by mistake and it ended up 'preserving' me." That explains most of it, but you're still confused. "Why was the amulet ready to break?" you ask. Blackhorn rubs the back of her head shyly. "I must have landed on it when I fell." she says embarrassed. She seems pretty quirky for a pirate.

"Really?" You ask. Grimmly Lodge closed in the summer and was empty. "What are going to do with it?"

"It's simple. During the summer, Grimmly Lodge becomes Grimmly Spa and Health Resort. It's going to be for women who have Lactose Overload Syndrome like myself. Azure will be manager for when it's Grimmly Lodge, and I have a gargoyle lined up to be manager for when it's Grimmly Spa and Health Resort." Breccia explained.

It will still be owned by Azure, but it will be a part of Stone Inc. We will also need to do a little construction. Things like widen doors, add sports courts, create new rooms, ect." Breccia continued.

"And," Azure started "She actually has a job lined up for you, Stephen."

"Sure, sounds like fun." You tell her.

"Great. Now if you will excuse me and Azure, we must finish our business." Breccia said.

You left the office. You couldn't believe it. Not only was this place going to be open in the summer as a spa, but you would get to work there.

15522222.title: What About a Crossover

155222221.content:
The shadow you see makes you turn pale as it is a large and obese shadow resembling a humanoid elephant. It was a loxodon and the only loxodon you knew was Elektra; a.k.a. the land equivalent of Paisley. You thought elephants were supposed to be vegetarians, but Elektra was just as bent on eating you as Paisley was and was more mobile than her. You could not believe it. And no Roxy or Elisa to defend you this time.

You nervously turn around to get a good look at what you believe to be your impeding doom. But you look in surprise because this was a different loxodon. She looked similar to Elektra, being a loxodon that resembled an Asia elephant and therefore of the variety with tuskless female but she was 350ft taller than Elektra and had a slightly larger stomach. She had a bluish shade to her black hair and her skin was a pale white color that resembled vanilla ice cream. She was dressed in a black and turquoise-colored Gothic Lolita outfit with a skirt, striped sleeves and leg warmers and skull-shaped earrings and a hair clip that was shaped like a bat. Her eyelids, toenails and fingernails were also painted black and she was holding an umbrella in her trunk that resembled a mollusk of some sort. The oddest thing was that she was levitating slightly off the ground with one of her legs lifted.

The loxodon notices you and is just as surprised to see you as you are of her. "Oh," she says. "You must be Stephen." You give a look of surprise but before you could ask how this elephantine giantess knows your name, you notice a human hiding behind her left ear and he appeared to be shivering. He was scrawny and had blond hair and was a pair of khaki pants with a gray hoodie and boots. He looked to be in his early 20s. You raise an eyebrow. This loxodon wasn't anything like Elektra. Not if there was a human on her that wasn't inside her. "Uh, yeah. I'm Stephen. And you are?"

The loxodon girl gestures to the human behind her ear that it's safe to come out of her ear and then he climbs onto the loxodon's finger. From your angle, you notice that this loxodon girl has fangs. Both in her mouth and in her trunk. "H-Hello," says the loxodon's human mate as he waves to you. "I'm Allen Van Richter and this is my wife, Salli." "Van Richter?" you think to yourself. That was Elektra's last name. And from what you knew about monster culture, the husband takes the family name of the wife, unlike the case with humans.

Salli holds down her trunk and you nervously shake it, being very wary of the fangs in the trunk. "Uh," you say. "You wouldn't happen to be related to a loxodon named Elektra would you?" Salli lets out a sigh as Allen gives a nervous look. "Yep," Salli says. "She's my mom. I take it you know her." "Actually," you say. "She's tried to eat me several times!" Allen lets out a groan. "Yeah. She tends to do that." Salli laughs nervously. "Well, you don't have to worry about me. I don't eat humans." Then Salli grabs you with her trunk and puts you on her shoulder next to Allen.

You bite your lip. "Uh," you say to Allen. "Not to be rude, but why does your wife have fangs? Loxodons don't have fangs." "Salli isn't 100% loxodon," said Allen. "Her dad is a vampire." Your eyes pop. Vampire? That would explain the fangs and the levitation but for a vampire to get that close to Elektra? "I didn't know Elektra was married." "Not anymore," says Salli. "My folks have been divorced for years and I was raised by my father in Direopolis. It's a mountain village that's far from here." "And it's full of crazies," says Allen. "So Salli and I took my brothers and their wives out for a retreat." You raise an eyebrow. "Brothers? Wives?"

Allen laughs nervously. "Well, my older brother, Wes married a werehippo and my younger brother, Norman, he married a wereboar." "They have good taste," you mutter to yourself. "Uh. Where are they right now?" Salli let out a sigh. "Knowing them, Pam probably got them lost."

- - - - - - - - - - -

Elsewhere in what appears to be the bottom of the ocean near the ruins of Atlantis, there is a car driving through the bottom and inside it are two female monsters as tall as Salli. One of them was a pink-skinned werehippo with golden red hair and a tattoo of a pyramid over her right eye. She was also wearing earrings shaped like scarab beetles. The driver was a brown-skinned were boar giantess with long blonde hair, six tusks and leather wings growing out of her back.

"This is the last time I let you drive, Pam," says the hippo woman in an annoyed tone. "I should've known you'd get us lost." "What choice did you have, Patty?" asked Pam the boar giantess. "You don't even know how to drive." In Patty's belly button was a tan-skinned bespectacled human male with black hair and a goatee and he rolled his eyes. "That's a very generous definition of "knows" in your case, Pam." There was a buff young man with short blonde hair who looked like a beefier version of Allen, riding in Pam's cleavage and her glared at Patty's husband.

- - - - - - - - - - -

Meanwhile, back at the lodge, you decide to ask several questions. "So, Allen. How did you and Salli meet?" "Well," says Allen. "We met in Gooseshout High in Direopolis." "Wait? A human enrolled in a school for giant monsters?" "Oh," says Allen. "You don't have to worry. Me, Wes and Allen are descendants of Achilles. We're indestructible.... except for our heels." "Then how did you wind up in..." "Because our older sister went to the same school." "Sister?" Salli lets out a laugh. "Actually, Corona is Allen's step-sister. That's what happens when your dad marries a minotaur." "Minotaur? Corona? Corona Poe! The actress!? A lot of Terrordale monsters are colossal fans." "Well, Corona is the one who introduced me to Salli and then I introduced my brothers to Salli's friends. Of course, Pam and Norman got married as soon as they could after high school, then Wes and Patty got hitched and finally, I proposed to Salli." "I doubt your in-laws took it well."

Salli gave a nervous laugh. "Well. Actually Dad gets along find with Allen and Mom is kind of apathetic to Allen." "I see. So, what do you two do in Direopolis?" Salli levitates higher and closes her umbrella before she speaks. "Well," she says. "We, my brothers-in-law and their wives run a restaurant called Neo Neapolitan. Patty and Wes are in charge of the kitchen, Allen and I wait tables and Pam is the delivery girl." "So you're a waitress? Like mother like daughter. What kind of restaurant is Neo Neapolitan?"

Both the Van Richters give a nervous laugh. "Well," said Salli. "I wanted the place to be a burger joint but Patty wanted it to be a pizzeria and ice cream parlor and Pam wanted to turn it into a donut shop. We came to a compromise and made it all four. Then last year, I had the idea to add pancakes to the menu." "What?!" you yell. "A restaurant that's 1/5 pizzeria 1/5 ice cream parlor 1/5 pancake house 1/5 burger joint and 1/5 donut shop?! What the actual heck?" "Believe me," says Salli with a sigh. "You should see some of the customers. Oh. I'm hungry. Come on, Allen. Let's see how a different restaurant measures up."

You blink as Salli levitates into the cafe and plops down onto two chairs before putting her umbrella down. These two were obviously from a very weird side of the monster world. Just who shows up to wait on the Van Richters' table?

I'm better off without him and I'm pretty sure that human-shaped wood tick feels the same."

I'm sure she knows but refuses to speak." Then you see Elektra let out a sigh. "What hurts the most is that I can never forget what happened," says Elektra. "But enough, how is Neo Neapolitan doing." "I never really cared for the taste of human myself." Elektra then takes an apple out of a nearby fruit bowl with her trunk and sinks her fangs into it to cause it to wither as she sucks it dry and then sprays the juice into her mouth.

"You have exotic taste, Allen," you tell Allen. "A vampire elephant? That's surreal." "My sisters-in-law aren't exactly normal monsters either." Says Allen. "Uh," you say. "Allen. Tell me about your brothers and their wives." "Well," says Allen. "Wes is the most level-headed of us, but he's got a sharp tongue on him. Opposites attract I guess because Patty has got quite a temper on her and gets annoyed easily." "She's a werehippo, right? Doesn't surprise me. They're known for having ferocious attitude." Salli then lowers her head to speak. "Don't forget, Patty's dad is a human and yet he gives Wes more grief than her monster mother." You were shocked at that. You had no idea that humans and monsters were capable of interbreeding. Then you realize something. "Wait," you think to yourself. "If Patty is half human and Wes is 100% human, then any child they have would only be 1/4 monster. But would they come out monster or human? That's a frightening thought." You then cough and shake your head. "Patty is the cook at Neo Neapolitan, isn't she."

Salli nods her head. "Patty's the best... er, second best cook I've ever seen. My cooking is mediocre compared to hers and Pam only knows how to make donuts." You had to wonder how Patty could keep up. It sounded like she was the only one in the kitchen and yet she had to juggle with preparing at least 5 different types of food. It also sounded like Patty was the big boss around Neo Neapolitan. "And your other, brother?" you ask Allen. "Norman?" asks Allen. "Well, in contrast to Wes, he's hot-headed, reckless and immature. He and Pam are a perfect match. Those two are always getting themselves into trouble or otherwise screwing up. Patty is always flustered with them. Pam's job is to deliver takeout since it's the only thing she can do right, Salli can't go out in the sunlight and Patty doesn't know how to drive." "I see. She's the wereboar, right? Don't tell me, she's a hybrid too?"

"Nope," says Salli. "Pam is 100% wereboar. But the strangest thing, she was born with wings. Nobody else in her family has them, so she's basically a mutant." You blink. This family was really bizarre. Three indestructible brothers, a minotaur actress for a stepsister and three wives consisting of a half-human hippopotamus, a vampire elephant and a literal flying pig. You then cough. "Uh. You mentioned that Corona Poe was your sister-in-law, Salli. Do you and Corona get along?" Salli lets out a sigh. "Corona gets along fine with me and Patty, but she hates Pam. Her boyfriend was devoured by a wereboar a long time ago and the wereboar in question looked similar to Pam." "I'm really sorry," you say. "Now tell me, Direopolis..."

"Direopolis is the weird part of the monster world," says Allen. "All our customers are weirdos with some strange quirk or another. We've got a catoblepas who is trying to combine basketball and sumo, a Jersey Devil archer who eats nothing but garlic, a sabertooth tiger mad scientist, a Nemean lion witch doctor, an elderly werecheetah who may or may not have been a phantom thief 100 years ago, a succubus who fancies herself a super villain..." "Good grief," you say. "It sounds like you set up shop in crazy town."

At that moment...
1552222212.title: Elephants Never Forget

155222222.content:
Here's another OC of the 12th Doctor.

Name: Shelby Pogovodon
Species: Ogopogo
Height: 735 ft.
Appearance: Shelby has a long snout, green scales, a bright red mohawk, black eyes, and a long tail. Like a number of Stephen's suitors, Shelby is obese, being fatter then Dinah. Shelby only has one arm, her other one having been eaten. She has no prosthetic arm, instead having a stump.
Personality: Shelby is a wannabe BBW model and another in Stephen's long line of suitors. She became attracted to him after watching him save a dronwing human at the beach. She plans to get much fatter to get his attention. Outside of trying to get Stephen, she likes to practice modeling and watch crappy horror movies.
155222222.title: Another Stalker

choices: Shelby Sees You and Snatches You Up
1552222221.content:
Into the lobby waddled somebody you did not wish to see and this causes you to groan. "So much for having some peace. The woman who came in was Shelby Pogovodon, a 735ft tall ogopogo, a monster resembling a more unpleasant counterpart to a Loch Ness Monster. Shelby was a green-skinned monster with a bright red mohawk and long tail. However, the most noticeable thing about her was that she was missing one of her arms. It was eaten off by an unknown creature. You don't know what it was and you don't want to know, given how large and horrifying such a beast would have to be. For some reason, Shelby hadn't gotten a prosthetic arm and left the stump exposed.

Shelby was also enormously obese, even more so than Roxy, Felicia and Dinah. Her belly even touched the ground as she walked. Shelby was a would-be BBW model. However, the reason she was so enormous was mainly as an excuse to attract you. She was yet another stalker much like April, Felicia, Dinah and Abilene and you had enough suitors already. She was swimming by when she saw you rescue a human kid from drowning. Being a lifeguard, it was your job but Shelby saw you as a hero and just your luck, she had a thing for heroes. She's been packing on the pounds ever since.

You weren't going to get any peace if that bloated ogopogo saw you, so you try your best to sneak away. As you do, you notice that Shelby was wearing nothing more than a pink bikini with yellow decorations of dinosaur teeth. It was abnormal attire for the slopes, but you heard that ogopogos loved the cold, so it made sense. As you were trying to slip away, you stop as the Canadian cryptic puts her webbed feet on the ground, nearly crushing you, and then turns on the television in the lobby.

On the television was a cartoon of the infamous Dr. Madman and the cyborg maniac appeared to be inside a computer and was taking apart a wall made up of data and eating everything. "Mmm," he said. "Emergency contact information. At that moment, Dr. Madman's arch nemesis, the bounty hunter, Mangaga, came in to confront him. "Dr. Madman!" yells Mangaga. "What are you doing?!" "Eating those files," said Dr. Madman as he continued to eat the binary code. "With no left overs. Mmm." Dr. Madman then took out a carton of milk from his belly bag and chugged it before letting out a belch. "Nothing like milk and cookies. Get it?! We're in a computer!" Mangaga lashed his arm out at Dr. Madman but accidentally broke the firewall and caused a stream of numbers to sweep him away as he yelled. Dr. Madman shook his head. "And people call me destructive."

"Ugh," groans Shelby as she activates the Hex Finity function on the television. "I can't stand this guy. He's so annoying. Aha, here we go." You mentally gag as you figure out which movie she ordered. It was a horror movie called the Red Freighter. It was supposed to be a horror/comedy film with a generous definition of supposed to be. Truth is, the Red Freighter was one of the worst movies ever created. Then again, Shelby had bad taste in movies. On the screen, there was a red freighter floating at the docks and from the looks of it, it was in terrible shape as the crew was getting on board.

But as you were about to leave the lobby...
1552222221.title: The Ogopogo

15522222211.content:
You try to get out before Shelby sees you, but the ogopogo hears you and her eyes pop out of her head as she spots you. “Stephen!” yells the ogopogo giantess. Before you can get out of the way, Shelby gets her enormous self right out of the seat and waddles her way over before she grabs you. The ogopogo lifts you up in the air and then sniffs you and even licks you as you yell. Her tongue is as cold as ice and causes you to tremble in pain. “It is you!” yells Shelby happily. “Hey, Stephen! What’s shaking!” Shelby lets out a laugh and presses you into her green and scaly cheek. “What are you doing here, Stephen?” You laugh nervously. “I kind of work here, Shelby.” Shelby gives a blink. “You do! That’s excellent!”

You let out a groan and shake your head. With how many would-be suitors that you had, Shelby included, it sometimes made you think you’d be better off with predatory monsters like Paisley. If Felicia or Dinah or goodness forbid, April, saw you with Shelby, it would be a total headache. Shelby licks you again and you moan before the ogopogo puts you on her head between her horns. “So, Stephen,” says Shelby as she laughs. “How have you been doing?” You let out a sigh. “I’ve been doing fine. Except the other day, I got turned down on a date with Connie.” Shelby let out a sigh. “Oh,” she says. “Oh. You poor thing. That’s no good. I mean, who could turn down a cutie like you. Oh!” Shelby tries to snap her fingers on her stub only to remember that that arm had been destroyed and had no fingers. So, in order to correct herself, Shelby snaps the fingers on her good hand.

“Actually,” says the ogopogo. “I have something for you.” “What is it?” you ask. “The Cryptid of the Month calendar?” Shelby just gave a laugh. “Oh, no, no, no, no, silly. You see, your friend Chihiro won tickets to the premiere of a movie that’s arriving in theaters tomorrow and it’s showing in Terrordale. She only needed one ticket, so she gave the rest to me, so I was wondering.” You give a gulp. From the sound of it, Shelby was asking you out on a date to go to the movies. You were so not looking forward to that. From what you knew of Shelby, her taste in movies was terrible. For one, she actually liked the movie, Crystal and the Bedazzles. You saw that movie and you wish you hadn’t. There was next to no plot or character significance at all. The only thing worse that you could think of was that movie that was a remake of a classic from the 70s. You saw that by accident due to a mishap when you got stuck in Reimu’s hair due to her chewing gum. It was supposed to be an action movie, but there was more flirting and dialogue than there was action. You shake your head.

“So,” said Shelby as she rolled her eyelids. “I was wondering if you wanted to come. Here’s the tickets.” Shelby hands you a ticket as big as a surfboard and you expect the movie she want to see to be something terrible. However, when you take a closer look, you realize just how wrong you were and gasp. “Gargoyles of the Galaxy II!?” you yell. You remembered that movie. It was awesome and funny. It made you cry at the beginning and end but also made you laugh everywhere in between. You had trouble deciding which of the characters was your favorite. The original movie won 5 stars. You could not believe that for once, Shelby picked a winner. “This movie,” you say. “It sounds awesome.”
 
Shelby nodded her head. “Kendall said you would. So what do you say, is it a date.” You were beginning to think about it and then you nodded your head. “I’m in.” “Yayzies!” yelled Shelby as she held up her hand. She would’ve clapped it, but she remembered she only had one and blushed. Perhaps this premiere might be a good idea. Besides, Shelby was friendly enough. You could agree to one date. You nod your head and into the room walks none other than...
15522222211.title: It's Cool to Be Cold

info.brief_description: Can you survive a ski resort for giant monsters? Winter sequel to Monster Shores
info.description:
(9/21/2016: Under new management. Originally created by RedHurricane)

You are Stephen from Monster Shores. Summer has ended and Gravefield Beach is closed for the season. What are you to do? Thankfully, your partner Roxy hooked you up with a winter job at the snowy mountainside near Terrordale. Until it gets warm enough for swimming again, you’ll be working as a ski-instructor at Grimmsly Lodge. But by the sea or in the mountains, you’ll still be getting into plenty of mischief.

         Slope Staff

Name: Roxy Maza
Species: Gargoyle
Height: 750ft
Appearance: A tall yellow skinned gargoyle girl with long black hair. Very beautiful despite being on the fat side. She’s traded her lifeguard’s outfit in for a blue snow jacket and a pair of earmuffs. Indoors, she wears a nurse’s outfit. 
Description: As with Monster Shores, Roxy is your loyal partner and best friend. You mainly stand on her shoulder to act as a second pair of eyes to the gargoyle giantess. While very friendly, Roxy can lose her temper when either you’re being antagonized by bullying monsters or when someone makes fun of her weight. In the winter time, Roxy acts as a nurse at the lodge, applying her lifeguard knowledge to monsters injured around the general area. Half the time, you’re helping Roxy out.

Name: Azure Skinwalker
Species: Werecoyote
Height: 700ft
Appearance: A giant silver furred coyote woman, heavyset in body shape but surprisingly attractive for her age. Is easily recognizable by the white crescent moon shaped birthmark in the center of her face. Due to her fur protecting her from the cold, she wears little more than an indigo shirt with gray pants.
 Description: Azure is your supervisor and the manager of Grimmsly Lodge, playing a similar role to Fran. Azure has a mild attitude towards you and is usually carefree. Even though she’s a type of monster that normally eats humans, she’s perfectly harmless and even allows humans in the lodge and warns them about the carnivorous guests. Azure also has a human husband named Vernon that acts as her assistant.

Name: Vernon Skinwalker
Species: Human
Height: 5ft
Appearance: A middle aged man with graying hair and a well built body that puts even your frame to shame. Usually seen wearing a red lumberjack's shirt and snow pants.
Description: Vernon is Azure's human husband and assistant. Nothing fazes this man and he and Azure have been married for 25 years. You still don't know how that works. Vernon is usually seen on Azure's shoulder but Azure has a tendency to kept him in her pants.

Name: Elisa Starking
Species: Bahamut
Height: 950ft
Appearance: A brown skinned monster resembling a hippopotamus with dragon’s wings, gills on her neck and the scales of a fish. Sports long blue hair that reaches down to her enormous rear. Elisa always wears a bright red scarf that along with her black snow suit. 
Description: Elisa is Roxy’s other best friend that you only see in the winter time. During the winter time, you spend half your time helping Roxy treat injured visitors and half with Elisa teaching visitors how to ski or snowboard. Fortunately for you Elisa is very friendly around humans and especially likes men. It takes a lot to get her angry but when this does happen, she can be the scariest monster you’ve ever seen. When enraged just enough, she breathes fire. Her favorite food is the dinosaurs that roam the mountainside.

Name: Connie Andrews
Species: Naga
Height: 400ft
Length: 600ft
Appearance: From the waist up, Connie resembles an overweight dark skinned goth girl with long black hair with indigo highlights. From the waist down she had the tail of a purple anaconda in place of her legs. Connie mainly wears black makeup with a black pearl piercing on her navel. Wears an indigo colored snowsuit with a hat. 
Description: As she is in Monster Shores, Connie is the one monster you have a crush on. While most nagas wouldn’t think twice about eating humans, Connie is unable to eat you without suffering an allergic reaction. During the Summer, she’s a surfer, but to your delight, she works as a tour guide in the mountain area during the winter on certain days. This gives you another chance to try and win her over.

Name: Ripple World
Species: Cerberus
Height: 650ft
Appearance: A hulking three headed and brown furred werewolf who is the most muscular monster you’ve ever seen. All three of her necks wear spiked chokers. Her left head has a yellow highlight in her hair, the center has a red highlight and the right has a blue highlight. All three of Ripple’s heads have ginger colored hair worn in ponytails. All she wears for clothes is a bikini and an apron since her fur protects her from the cold.
Description: Ripple is the chef at the cafe built into the Grimmsly Lodge. You have to be careful around her because her three heads have different personalities. Her center head is an angry brute, her right head is a constantly depressed crybaby and her left head is a hyperactive optimist. While the left and right heads are harmless, Ripple’s center head eats humans and what’s worse is that it’s not easy to tell which head is in control of the body at any given time.

         Waitresses- There’s a cafe built into the Grimmsly Lodge where Ripple works and you know the five waitresses personally. All of them wear maid’s outfits with fishnet stockings and bow ties.

Name: Felicia Skinwalker
Species: Werejaguar
Height: 600ft
Appearance: A chubby black furred jaguar girl with spots visible on her back. Looks around 18 years old or the monster equivalent of it. Felicia has long black hair and bright green eyes. Wears a gold-yellow maid’s outfit.
 Description: Felicia is the head waitress of the lodge and Azure’s adoptive daughter. Despite being a predatory species and being somewhat hyperactive, Felicia is very fond of humans, mostly because her adoptive father is a human. However, she is also really playful in regards to humans, like a cat with a ball of yarn. Thankfully for you, she’s also very careful not to hurt humans and in fact is extremely hostile towards monsters that do eat humans.

Name: Camille Longneck
Species: Weregiraffe
Height: 1500ft
Appearance: A large green weregiraffe with a pear shaped body and long yellow green hair. Her neck alone is 600 feet long, making her even taller than Roxy’s sister Petra. Wears a green maid’s outfit.
 Description: You’re scared to death of Camille. She may not be a human eater, but she has weird psychic abilities such as telekinesis and can read minds. Camille has a morbid habit of asking you if you’d like to know how you’ll die that you find creepy of her. Camille mainly has a cruel sense of humor regarding humans, albeit not outright malicious.

Name: Victoria Marian
Species: Frankenstein
Height: 500ft
Appearance: An hourglass shaped Frankenstein with long black and white striped hair worn in a ponytail. Victoria’s right side is organic and made up of different patchwork corpses of different colors while the left side of her body is completely made of metal with a mechanical eye. Wears a black maid’s outfit.
Description: While Victoria means well, the Frankenstein giantess is an incurable klutz. She was improperly put together by a second rate scientist and tends to fall apart easily. You’re afraid that Victoria’s clumsiness going to get you killed one of these days.

Name: Dinah Vile
Species: Werecroc
Height: 900ft
Appearance: An enormous hourglass shaped werecrocodile with blue scales with a yellow underbelly and blonde hair reaching down to her butt. Wears a blue maid’s outfit.
 Description: Dinah is the winter equivalent of April and stalks you in a manner that would make the werewolf girl jealous. Dinah purposely wears the skimpiest maid’s outfit so she can flirt with you and sometimes gives you free service. Sometimes if you’re not careful she’ll even snatch you up. Doesn’t like other monsters to get near you, not even Roxy, Elisa or Azure and can get insanely jealous if she thinks another monster has the hots for you.

Name: Elektra Von Richter
Species: Loxodon
Height: 1000ft
Appearance: An enormous humanoid Asian elephant, really large in body shape but still beautiful. Has long black hair with two red highlights and wears a red maid’s outfit.
Description: Elektra is the best waitress in the Lodge after Felicia and provides the fastest service. Mostly because she has a photographic memory regarding orders. Unfortunately for you, Elektra is the land equivalent of your mermaid nemesis Paisley. She loves to eat humans and has made it perfectly clear that she wants you in her belly.

         Mountain Regulars

Name: Sora Hofferson
Species: Wyvern
Height: 750ft
Appearance: A pear shaped gray skinned dragoness with her purple pterodactyl like wings attached to her arms. She has a human looking face but with the muzzle of a dragon full of sharp teeth. Sora also has white hair and two horns on top of her head. For clothing, she wears an orange snow jacket and black shorts. 
Description: Sora is a photographer and artist who mainly comes to the mountainside to get images for collages she works on. She has a reputation as a serial dater and she’s somewhat interested in you but you’re intimidated by the fact that she’s a carnivorous monster. Sora has an odd habit of lightly sitting on humans and she’s used you as a seat cushion a few times. Sora is a friend of Connie, but the other monsters don’t like her much because she doesn’t ask permission when she takes pictures.

Name: Hippolyta Grimwald
Species: Hippogriff
Height: 600ft
Appearance: A large hippogriff with bright silver feathers and wings on her back with talons for hands. From the waist down she has the lower body of a gray furred horse. Hippolyta only wears a white A-shirt. 
Description: Hippolyta thinks of herself as a treasure hunter and comes to the mountainside every year because there’s supposedly a pirate’s treasure worth millions in skulls (monster currency) hidden somewhere in the mountains. So far she hasn’t been successful finding it. She’s invited you to accompany you several times, offering you a share of the treasure, but you have yet to take the hippogriff giantess up on that offer.

Name: Zoe Joss
Species: Landshark
Height: 575ft
Appearance: A giant hourglass shaped humanoid hammerhead shark. Middle aged but still attractive looking. She is bald and has a large chip taken out of the side of her dorsal fin. For clothing, she wears a gray snow parka and a pair of boots as well as gloves that fit over her webbed hands. Zoe also wears a pair of spiked sunglasses that somehow fit on her abnormally shaped head.
 Description: Normally Zoe would be carnivorous towards humans, if she knew you were a human. Zoe is blind and convinced that you’re a fairy, she went senile when she was 30. You hate to be mistaken for the same species as your hated enemy Stella but you have to pretend to be a fairy or Zoe will eat you alive. For some reason her blindness hasn’t effected her ability to snowboard. She's also the mother of Avery from Monster Shores according to UltimateNeo.

Name: Blair Stallion
Species: Pegasus
Height: 675ft
Appearance: A giant and heavy set yellow anthro horse with golden wings on her back and long orange hair and mane. Wears a red snow dress with a flower in her hair and usually a pair of ice skates.
 Description: Blair is an arrogant ice skater that visits every winter to get in some practice. She looks down on most other monsters and takes great pride in her species. Blair has a low opinion of humans and tends to speak down to you as if you were a child. It doesn’t help that she thinks Azure keeps you around the lodge as a slave and has been known to order you around like the time she made you paint her hooves.

Name: Comet Bovine
Species: Minotaur
Height: 700ft
Appearance: A giant black and white spotted holstein cow minotaur with brown hair tied in a bun and a large pink udder as big as her head. Comet is somewhat fat in the stomach but with muscular arms and legs. Wears a purple snow jacket and pants with a cowgirl’s hat.
 Description: Comet is the niece of Mesa from Monster Shores. The minotaur giantess mainly comes up to the mountain for skiing. Mesa warned you that Comet used to have a human boyfriend but she caught him cheating on her with a salamander from Horrorville and as a result, she loathes humans to the point of squishing them on sight. Unfortunately for you, her ex-boyfriend looked a lot like you do and the resemblance fills her with great anger to the point of trying to kill you sooner than looking at you. Comet has a burning hatred of dragons and similar monsters because of the salamander that stole her boyfriend and gets along poorly with Elisa and Sora.

Name: Drew
Species: Frilled Shark
Height: 800ft
Appearance: A 31 year old land shark with a serpentine lower body and the upper body of a shark woman with red eyes, serrated teeth and webbed fingers.
Description: An addition by Ultimate Neo. Drew is Zoe's niece and Avery's cousin. She's somewhat odd and comes off as a stalker but it's mainly because she's mute. She has a job as a jack-of-all-trades woman due to her cousin going crazy and her aunt going senile early. But she still speaks highly of them and is very friendly towards humans.

Name: Alexis
Species: Neko
Height: 350ft
Appearance: A black furred werecat with white tips on her ears, paws and tail. She wears little more than a skimpy black bikini over her petite form and has one yellow eye and one blue eye, the former appears to be magical.
Description: An addition by Oregulus. Alexis is a guest learning how to ski at the lodge because she moved to Terrordale too late for Summer, but she's already planning to learn how to surf. You don't know how she feels about humans though.

Name: Kari and Sonia
Species: Driders
Height: 500ft (Kari) 300ft (Sonia)
Appearance: Kari is a giant 18 year old red haired girl with purple eyes and the lower body of an enormous spider while her sister Sonia is a 10 year old drider with blue hair and blue eyes. Sonia wears a shirt while Kari wears a black bikini that somehow fits around her eight legs and enormous abdomen.
Description: Additions by UltraGTS Kari and her little sister Sonia came to the lodge to learn to ski and snowboard. They're both friendly and are very close to each other and love humans, Sonia especially. Sonia is one of the very few children at the lodge.

Name: Ivy Noroi
Species: Slime Creature
Height: 950 ft.
Appearance: Ivy's entire body is made of up of purple slime. Even her eyes are solid purple. She uses her slime to give herself short, spikey hair. Her default appearance is that of an pear shaped woman, with modest breasts and a medium waist.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. If one word could describe Ivy, it's "Dreamer". She's loves to dream, and come up with fantastic worlds and amazing characters. So it's fitting that she is a novelist. Her most famous series is the "Zyzoranda Dimension" series, about an amazon who saves the dimension of Zyzoranda from an evil werecat sorceress. When not writing, she's either brainstorming for her next book, or admiring her crush, Elisa Starking. If it isn't Elisa, then she's admiring her dream type of woman: women with enormous rears.

Name: Breccia Marie Stone
Species: Gargoyle
Height: 1300 ft.
Appearance: Breccia has violet skin with similarly colored eyes and hair, which is short and spikey. She has an average build, but due to having Lactose Overload Syndrome, her breasts are gargantuan, obscuring her torso, and full of milk that she can't lactate. She has medium sized wings on her back. She wears a specially tailored grey business suit that shows of her cleavage and high heels.
Personality: An addition by the 12th Doctor. Breccia is the CEO of Stone Inc., a massive company with many branches, including medical and travel. She is a cold and calculating woman, always putting business in front of everything else. However, she is friendly towards humans and truly loves her gorgon girlfriend, who is also her secretary. She's visiting Grimmly Lodge in hopes that she can purchase it. Part of her business has a charity/home to help women with LOS, which she has.

Name: Shelby Pogovodon
Species: Ogopogo
Height: 735 ft.
Appearance: Shelby has a long snout, green scales, a bright red mohawk, black eyes, and a long tail. Like a number of Stephen's suitors, Shelby is obese, being fatter then Dinah. Shelby only has one arm, her other one having been eaten. She has no prosthetic arm, instead having a stump.
Description: An addition by the 12th Doctor. Shelby is a wannabe BBW model and another in Stephen's long line of suitors. She became attracted to him after watching him save a dronwing human at the beach. She plans to get much fatter to get his attention. Outside of trying to get Stephen, she likes to practice modeling and watch crappy horror movies.

Name: Tamera Croaker
Species: Werefrog
Height: 900 ft.
Appearance: Tamera has shiny purple skin, red hair in a ponytail, and green eyes. Like most frogs, she has a super long tongue, three webbed fingers, and three webbed toes. Due to a curse from Raven Eckerton, Tamera's breasts, belly, and butt are extremely large and full of water she can't get rid of.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Tamera used to be extremely angry. She would always blow up at the slightest thing and attack others. This, unfortunately, got her on the bad side of Raven Eckerton. She snapped at Raven for bumping into her, and Raven put a curse on her. Now, every time she gets angry or attacks someone, her body bloats up with more water. Now she is trying to change, but finds that her temper is too great.

Name: Maddie/Edith/Sarah Marlok
Species: Gorgon/Cerberus hybrid
Height: 930 ft.
Appearance: Due to being a Gorgon/Cerberus hybrid, these three have one body, but three heads. Their body is obese with orange scales. Sarah, the left head, has red, black, and yellow scales, yellow eyes, and king cobra snakes for hair. Edith, the middle head, has light brown scales, green eyes, and Egyptian cobras for hair. Maddie, the right head, has green scales, red eyes, and boa constrictors for hair. How they dress depends on who controls the body.
Personality: Another OC of the 12th Doctor. These three women are a rarity: as the daughters of a gorgon and a Cerberus, the sisters are three heads on one body. Each head has it's own personality, though they all get along fairly well. The left head, named Sarah, suffers from horrible confidence and esteem issues. She is quick to apologize and feels useless at times. Edith, the middle head, is a musician, mostly favoring punk rock. She's loud and demanding. Maddie, the right head, is a flirt with a particular taste: she loves extremely fat woman.

         Boarders- There are two monsters that rent out a couple of rooms underneath the lodge. Unfortunately, neither of them like each other and are always feuding. Azure mainly sends you down to check on them or settle whatever petty squabble they have going on.

Name: Helga Cisco
Species: Troll
Height: 500ft
Appearance: An hourglass shaped blue skinned troll with pointed ears, spikes running down her back and sharp fangs sticking out the sides of her mouth. Somewhat scrawny compared to other trolls and wears a pair of thin glasses. 
Description: Helga is the daughter of Fran (Your supervisor at Gravefield Beach in the Summer). Unlike her dimwitted mother, Helga is very intelligent and specializes in gadgetry. She has a workshop underneath the lodge where she builds all sorts of her inventions and has welcomed you to come in anytime. While Helga respects her mother, she is embarrassed at the low intelligence of their race and how she’s not as strong as all the other trolls.

Name: Helena Greer Krofft
Species: Weretiger
Height: 875 ft.
Story: Monster
Appearance: Helena has a surprising resemblance to Marvel comics character Tigra. She has orange fur with black stripes and green eyes like Tigra, but she has long, silver hair in a ponytail and cat eye glasses. Helena is morbidly obese, to the point of needing a motorized wheelchair to move, and is still getting fatter.
Personality: An OC of the 12th Doctor. Helena is a virologist (scientist who studies viruses) who is completely obsessed with the nebutori virus. She wants to understand what it is and how it works for infections and weight gain. But she has no desire to cure it. Rather, she wants to make a strain that is completely incurable. Her first attempt at this was tested on herself, and resulted in never ending weight gain. People often call her Tigra, due to her resemblance to the Marvel comics character. She loves that name and is proud of it.

Name: Serena Ennick
Species: Orc
Height: 800 ft.
Appearance: Serena has green skin, black eyes, and brown hair in a buzz cut. She has two large, sharp tusks in her mouth. Unlike Helena, Serena is incredibly muscular and still getting bigger.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor Serena is Helena's assistant, and is completely obsessed with her. She seems to practically worship Helena, constantly praising her and treating her like a queen or goddess. Some think Serena is just kissing up to Helena to get a better social standing, while others think Serena is relying on Helena to have an identity. During one of Helena's test, Serena was injected with a virus that caused muscle growth. She is still growing

Name: Lydia Kama
Species: Kamaitachi
Height: 300ft
Appearance: A giant teal furred weasel girl with short black hair and pink ears. Very fat in the stomach, resulting in her wearing a black bikini and sorceress’s cape. Has sharp sickle like claws for fingers and toes. You swear you’ve seen those claws cut through steel. Lydia also mainly carries around a giant wand with a sphere at the end. 
Description: Lydia is a sorceress who lives in a lab underneath the lodge where she works on spells and potions that she sells. She’s somewhat condescending when it comes to humans and hates Helga with a passion. Sort of a magic vs. science debate. You don’t like visiting her lair because you heard Lydia keeps humans in cages for unknown purposes. Though this may just be a rumor

Name: Raven Pandora Eckerton
Species: Werecat
Height: 900 ft.
Appearance: Raven has long, silver hair, silver eyes, and silver fur. Raven's body is a serious hourglass shape, with huge breasts, a narrow waist, and a large butt. Usually wears clothing that is typical of a sorceress.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Raven is a sorceress who is the very definition of vain. She is truly obsessed with her beauty, determined to be the most beautiful creature in the known universe. She believes that she'll become more powerful the more beautiful she is. Befitting of someone with her vanity, she used her black magic to make herself immortal and eternally young (somewhere in her mid 20's), with the side effect of her hair, fur, and eyes turning silver. Being called ugly or even average sends her into a rage. She also hates anyone she thinks is prettier than her. Her beauty has given her admirers, but her vanity and short temper means she has no friends or lovers.

         Misc.

Name: Fatima Knight
Species: Wraith
Height: 450ft
Appearance: A pitch black ghost resembling a living shadow with a glowing light in the center of her chest and a pair of glowing white eyes shaped like glasses. 
Description: Fatima is the ghost of the last human they hired to work at Grimmsly Lodge and Elisa’s previous partner. She was lost in a snowstorm and Azure, Elisa and Roxy were unable to find her in time. Fatima gets her revenge by haunting the lodge and playing mean spirited pranks on everybody. That woman is the winter equivalent of Stella because she enjoys tormenting you most of all and hates living humans.

Name: Corey Argo
Species: Yeti
Height: 800ft
Appearance: An hourglass shaped and light blue skinned yeti girl with white fur and long pink hair. For clothing, she mainly wears a black cape and red domino mask along with a black and white striped unitard.
Description: Corey is one of the yetis that live in the area near the lodge. She's an inspector that comes to the lodge on a regular basis to make sure it's up to code. Despite her job, Corey hates skiers and snowboarders because of the racket they cause and because she lives at the bottom of the cliff where the lodge was build and would like nothing better than to see the Grimmsly Lodge destroyed or shut down. Although you don't know what she thinks of humans.

Name: Selene Howler
Species: Werewolf
Height: 700ft
Appearance: A fat gray furred werewolf girl with a reddish tint in her fur. Wears a tight sweater that hugs her entire body.
Description: An addition by InfiniteBull Selene is a cousin of your werewolf friend April from the beach. She lives in a cabin near the mountainside and is a sculptor who has surrounded her cabin with numerous ice sculptors. Unfortunately, unlike April, Selene is one of those werewolves that sees humans as food and even if she knows about you from April, it might not save you from being eaten.

Name: Karen Shade
Species: Aumbra
Height: Varies, but usually stays around 900 ft.
Appearance: Karen has no hair or obvious facial features beyond glowing green eyes. Meaning she lacks a nose and mouth. Her body resembles a living shadow, pitch black and transparent. She has a huge hourglass figure. She has no clothes, but has a Barbie Doll Anatomy.
Description: An addition by the 12th Doctor. Living in an old, decrepit ski lodge a mile away from Grimmsly Lodge, Karen is a cruel person. She loves stealing the life force of anyone stupid enough to cross her path. She prefers to do so slowly, enjoying the fear and torment her victims feel. If her target is injured, she pretends to be nice, luring them into a false sense of security. She has very limited shape-shifting abilities, but never uses them, preferring her true form. She is weakened by the light.

Name: Umbra
Species: Boogeyman
Height: Varies, but is usually 900 ft.
Appearance: Umbra has pale blue skin, short black hair, blood red eyes, and sharp teeth. She has long claws for fingernails. She has a Glasgow Grin, a scar that goes from ear to ear, looking like a horrific smile. Her body depends on what the person or monster fears.
Description: An O.C. of the 12th Doctor. Umbra is "The Thing in the Closet", "The Monster Under the Bed", and "The Figure Just Out of the Corner of your Eye". As the living embodiment of fear, she delights in terrorizing others, using their fears against them. In her world, she rules all, but in the normal world, her power depends on how much a person is afraid. If they aren't, she's powerless. She also cannot go out in the daylight.

Rules
Please keep this a fantasy. No mecha, mutate or human giantesses. Frankensteins exist in folklore so they don’t count as mecha.
No toilet stuff. I hate it.
Try not to end the story too soon.
Keep interaction with male monsters to a minimum.
All monsters are giants at all times. Minimum is 300ft.
Try not to take anything sexual too far. I like my stories focused on plot instead.
Characters from Monster Shores can appear because both stories take place in the same city. In fact it's encouraged.
There are dinosaurs in the mountains that often give Stephen trouble but none of them are as big as the monsters. If anything they’re canon fodder.
No crossovers with Ryzanyes. In fact, I better not see that word mentioned anywhere in the story. They don't take place in the same universe.
If you create a new character don't give them the same name as an existing character. It's lazy and it causes confusion.
Please no Male Preds! I thought I didn't have to say it!
Have Fun
